text: Airicoto (possibly from Quechua ayri axe, qutu heap, "axe heap") is a mountain in the Chila mountain in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is located in the Arequipa Region, Castilla Province, Choco District. It lies northeast of Quiscapampa and east of Yuraccacsa. Airicoto is also the name of the valley west of the mountain. Its waters flow to Colca River in the south. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Airicoto
